title: (x) Cheesecake rounded geometric sans - (similar to) Frankfurter, VAG Rounded {Patricia, David H}
content:
Hey mates,

Does anybody know which font this is?  
Normally I wouldn't use such a cheesy font but  
my client wants something similar to this.

That would be great..

Grtz Chris82

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164147im_/http:/typophile.com/files/speurders.gif)
author: Chris82

comments.content: I was gonna say Frankfurter but it seems no...
try Vag Rounded Black (Linotype or Adobe)

Here is VAG Rounded Black:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164147im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gratis.gif)

ChrisL
The A is flaired at the lower terminals

IDD that looks a lot like it people.  
Thank you for your help.

Merry Christmas to you all.

[www.futuredesign.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164147/http:/www.futuredesign.nl/ "www.futuredesign.nl")
It looks a lot like Frankfurter to me, except that the G has been modified.
